footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the PSE Team

hero.createText: Create interactive data-driven twins of your machines, buildings or processes — easily via DigiTwin Studio

fillOnly.title: Fill only what you need to!
fillOnly.description: Gone are the days of filling every field in AASX explorer when they can be filled automatically, DigiTwin Studio has got your back, With DigiTwin Studio you only fill what you really have to.

easyToUse.title: As easy as it gets!
easyToUse.description: The UI has been designed with the user experience in mind and is easily usable. Now everyone can create submodels.

advanced.title: Advanced only when you need it to be
advanced.description: DigiTwin Studio will only ask for you to provide the necessary information but will still allow you to input whatever you might need through advanced section.

signin.title: We recommend signing into the website to experience all of the features we offer such as saving your files, but you can continue as a guest if you wish
signin.policy: By using our services, you accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

tooltips.name: This name will be used as the title for your model in the Dashboard and Marketplace
tooltips.description: Optional field for a short description of your model
tooltips.id: Unique identifier for the Asset Administration Shell
tooltips.assetKind: Denotes whether the asset is of kind "Type", "Instance", "Role" or none of these types is applicable
tooltips.globalAssetId: Identifier of the asset, the Asset Administration Shell is representing
tooltips.specificAssetId: Additional domain-specific, typically proprietary identifier for the asset like serial number, manufacturer part ID, customer part IDs, etc.
